page.title: 13RECREATION - GULVAL MARAZION
page.content: Local people and visitors enjoy the {beaches}which are safer than many in Cornwall. Many people go to swim and sunbathe on warm days and children enjoy building sandcastles. There is a {sailing club}at Marazion. Rough seas attract{surfers}who ride in on the waves, balancing on a fibreglass surf board.{Windsurfers}balance on a surfboard with a sail. Like surfers, they keep warm even in winter by wearing neoprene wetsuits. The caravan site{dance club}attracts local and visiting young people to its discos. At the Kenegie Manor Hotel{plays}are performed outside on summer evenings. The South-West Coastal Footpath follows the foreshore, and other public footpaths make pleasant country {walks.}
